name: Prescribing of standard release tramadol
title: Prescribing of standardvrelease tramadol
compared with prescribing of all tramadol preparations
description: compared with prescribing of all tramadol preparations
why_it_matters: Modified release tramadol preparations vary widely in cost. Generic tramadol 50mg capsules are low-cost.
Ideally modified-release preparations should be reserved for patients who have compliance issues.
